title: Wild Fire
description: Kasha has at last embraced the fact she’s not quite human. Hard not to when a blue glow surrounds her fingers, as well as the blades she wields. That is not normal. No one’s sure just what she really is, but now she needs answers. She would not find them on earth primary. With a leap of faith, she travels to another world, one where she hopes to discover the secret of her birth.But before she can do that she must find and save Leonidas, the king of the fada on earth prime. Even though she can never be his queen. Because some things are beyond either of their control.Real or not, a dream they once shared was all they can ever have.
author: LaVerne Thompson
